mutants.code:
def count_funny_pairs(n, a):
    cnt = [{} for _ in range(2)]
    xor = 1
    result = 0
    cnt[1][0] = 1
    for (i, x) in enumerate(a):
        xor ^= x
        index = i & 1
        result += cnt[index].get(xor, 0)
        cnt[index][xor] = cnt[index].get(xor, 0) + 1
    return result
